CustomField.description:
SHAVEEN06DEC2010CASE599 > This is the Unique ID that will be used to identify the unique USER across USER, CONTACT and ACTIVE DIRECTORY.
Revashlin > 13112013 >> Changed Label to NT Username, field is required for reporting purposes and Altiris rollouts. Removed help text, no longer applicable to use of field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Login Username used to log into Standard Bank network access (i.e. doej/smithj) (80 characters or less)
CustomField.label: NT Username
